Package ivory.ptc.sampling

Interface Summary
Criterion Criterion for sampling pseudo judgments.
 

Class Summary
LengthCountCriterion Sampling criterion based on the length of the query.
LinkCountCriterion Sampling criterion based on the number of target documents.
TopNCriterion Returns top N pseudo queries and judgments passed to this criterion.
